item.title: How a volatile 24 hours edged the Middle East to a ceasefire
item.description: From an attack on a US air base to a fragile ceasefire, this is how the Middle East conflict changed overnight.

item.title: Leaders arrive at Hague summit as Nato chief Rutte flatters Trump
item.description: It is the US president's first Nato summit since 2019 and all 32 leaders are set to commit to a big hike in defence spending.

item.title: British man charged over 'wedding' with child, 9, at Disneyland Paris
item.description: The 39-year-old is a convicted sexual offender who is wanted in the UK, French prosecutors have said.

item.title: Brazilian tourist who fell off Indonesian volcano found dead
item.description: Juliana Marins survived the initial fall during an early morning hike along a trail on Mount Rinjani.

item.title: Venice protesters claim victory as Bezos changes wedding venue
item.description: No Space for Bezos activist group tells BBC they are "very proud of this".
